name: The Lezbian Doctors
detailed_description:
Story
The Lezbian Doctors is a comics book about doctors who sexually abuse their patients.
Two comics included:
Dr. Tanya: A Sexologist who is obsessed with women`s pussies!
Dr. Aleen: A Gynecologist who is obsessed with women`s assholes!

Gameplay
The Lezbian Doctors is a comics book with music and some animations. This comics contains explicit sexual content and nudity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6600 or better DirectX 12 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600 or better, 1080p resolution
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
